p: In the present study, we report the experience of patients with thalassemia and sickle cell disease treated with DAAs therapy at the Thalassemia Unit of S. Eugenio Hospital of Rome. The study was conducted in accordance with the principles of Good Clinical Practice, the Declaration of Helsinki and all the local regulations. The treatments with DAAs were applied according to criteria defined by national guidelines and were authorized by Italian Medicines Agency. All patients provided their written informed consent to participate in this study.
